# ecn

**Instance Property**

A specific Explicit Congestion Notification flag value to set on an IP packet.

## Declaration

```swift
var ecn: NWProtocolIP.ECN { get set }
```

## Sending IP Options

- **init()**: Initializes an IP packet configuration with default settings.
- **NWProtocolIP.ECN**: Flag values for Explicit Congestion Notifications in IP packets.
- **serviceClass**: A specific service class to mark on an IP packet.
